name: hacked worlds
description:
by Soheil Abak

The boy sleeps one night and wakes up in the morning in another world. A virtual world! A world in which he does not have much authority and only has to do what he is commanded to do. No one in this world can speak. Everyone there is a robot. The situation is very confusing and it is not clear exactly what is happening. He is just thinking of escaping the virtual world.

      In this game, you take personal control and you have to do the things that are asked of you. Sometimes you have to find your own way. You also need to destroy the red viruses with the power you have.

.

.

.
